A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While not a 1/2 out of 5\, I feel obligated to review it as such to balance all the drones and bots reviewing this as a 5 out of 5.\n\nFundamentally destroys the character of luke skywalker turning him into a coward while pushing a series of preachy agendas\, the movie is filled with pointless filler and disregards all questions presented by its predecesesor\, barnished with a predictable glossy corporate hollywood finish. star wars is over
